course.subject: ACCT
course.name: Equity Investment with Machine Learning
course.description: This course introduces the application of quantitative and machine learning technology in equity investing. It covers classical equity valuation theories, cutting-edge capital market research and recent development in quantitative and machine learning technology. Students will be required to apply the knowledge to develop and test equity investment strategies.
course.prerequisites: (ACCT 5100 OR ACCT 5150) AND FINA 5120
